resource.chars:
a fact of which the author was totally unaware until 
his arrival in England in the end of 1850.
Still as M. Krohn gives merely his conclusions 
without details or figures - his promised memoir 
not having appeared (so far as the writer of the present p[aper?] is aware)
it is hoped that this anticipation - will, [text?]
shewing that perfectly independent observers arr[ive?]
at the same result, rather tend to increase, than 
to diminish any insight that may be attached to 
the <s>author’s researches <\s> present researches
